action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Graduate Assistants Parity Act or the GAP Act
This bill modifies the requirements for calculating taxable income to allow all graduate students who are employees of educational organizations to exclude tuition reductions from gross income. (Under current law, the exclusion for graduate students is limited to teaching and research assistants.)
